channel.title: Need help with .bat files
channel.description:
I need help and i don't know if this is the right section because i don't know if it's a problem with java or with vps.
Well i'm going to make a rsps server it's a 64-bit system Windows Server 2008 and i installed in it Java jdk1.7.0_09 latest version and when i open Run.bat or compiler.bat it opens Magnifier and it doesn't start Compiler or Server. So i don't know what is the problem can anyone help me with this ?
P.S: In my pc it works i just uploaded and didn't change anything but it doesn't work on VPS
